place.name: Y BONT FAEN
place.gazetteerText: PONTFAEN, a parish in Haverfordwest district, Pembroke; on the river Gwaen, 4¼ miles S S W of Newport, and 9 N of Clarbeston-Road r. station. Post-town, Fishguard, under Haverfordwest. Acres, 695. Real property, £371. Pop., 32. Houses, 9. The living is a p.curacy in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £72. Patron, R. E. Arden, Esq. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
